title: fix: Make create flow button to have a consistent style with rest of the theme

fix(Editor): add scroll capability with boundaries

body:
Bumps [brace-expansion](https://github.com/juliangruber/brace-expansion) from 1.1.11 to 1.1.12.
Release notes

Sourced from brace-expansion's releases.

v1.1.12

  • pkg: publish on tag 1.x c460dbd
  • fmt ccb8ac6
  • Fix potential ReDoS Vulnerability or Inefficient Regular Expression (#65) c3c73c8

https://github.com/juliangruber/brace-expansion/compare/v1.1.11...v1.1.12

  • c460dbd pkg: publish on tag 1.x
  • ccb8ac6 fmt

Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/automatisch/automatisch/network/alerts).

title: test: add open first step in flow editor
feat(Editor): introduce sidebar with leaner graph
chore(deps): bump @node-saml/passport-saml from 4.0.4 to 5.1.0 in /packages/backend

body:
Bumps [@node-saml/passport-saml](https://github.com/node-saml/passport-saml) from 4.0.4 to 5.1.0.
Release notes

Sourced from @​node-saml/passport-saml's releases.

v5.1.0

🔗 Dependencies

  • Revert release-it for Node@18 compatibility #962
  • Update minor dependencies #961

📚 Documentation

  • Update Sponsor information - Stytch #960

⚙️ Technical Tasks

  • Lint #954

v5.0.1

  • Update node-saml/xml-crypto to address CVE (#953) (4486ac9)
  • Lint (113412a)
  • Update README.md to reflect updated node-saml (#945) (a9df549)
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 2 to 3 (#902) (a1f973f)

v5.0.0

  • Update nested dependencies (#898) (53d7a0d)
  • Update prettier (#897) (b44b581)
  • Update major versions of dependencies (#896) (65c74bd)
  • Update minor dependencies (#895) (d7e7e6b)
  • Update to @​node-saml/node-saml v5 (#894) (fba0b16)
  • Update to Node 18 (#893) (fac7993)
  • Fix circular references #879 (#880) (a06ff72)
  • StrategyOptionsCallback shouldn't have to pass all SAML options (#838) (430d94e)
  • Fix README to require correct module name (#884) (eacbbbb)
  • Update README to point to node-saml documentation (#886) (30b1478)
  • Adjust type enforcement to remove warnings (#889) (2389a5e)
  • Update package.json script to mirror node-saml (#888) (cf541a5)
  • Remove unused AuthorizeOptions type (#887) (f574901)
  • Clarify SLO support in passport-saml (#862) (0e34bc8)
  • Add bot to close stale issues (#864) (96f49d2)
  • Clean up types (#813) (930082a)
  • Roll-up changelog entries for beta releases (#867) (a14f25a)
Changelog

Sourced from @​node-saml/passport-saml's changelog.

5.1.0 (2025-07-24)

🔗 Dependencies

  • Revert release-it for Node@18 compatibility #962
  • Update minor dependencies #961

📚 Documentation

  • Update Sponsor information - Stytch #960

⚙️ Technical Tasks

  • Lint #954

v5.0.1 (2025-03-14)

🔗 Dependencies

  • [github_actions] Bump github/codeql-action from 2 to 3 #902

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • [security] Update node-saml/xml-crypto to address CVE #953

📚 Documentation

  • Update README.md to reflect updated node-saml #945

v5.0.0 (2024-03-27)

💣 Major Changes

  • Update major versions of dependencies #896
  • Update to @​node-saml/node-saml v5 #894
  • Update to Node 18 #893
  • Clean up types #813

🚀 Minor Changes

  • Update minor dependencies #895

🔗 Dependencies

  • Update nested dependencies #898
  • Update prettier #897

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 9fcf3d2 Release 5.1.0
  • f4b3009 Revert release-it for Node@18 compatibility (#962)
  • a9b1bd1 Update minor dependencies (#961)
  • 756d173 Update Sponsor information - Stytch (#960)
  • 61783e2 Lint (#954)
  • 100bd17 Release 5.0.1
  • 4486ac9 Update node-saml/xml-crypto to address CVE (#953)
  • 113412a Lint
  • a9df549 Update README.md to reflect updated node-saml (#945)
  • a1f973f Bump github/codeql-action from 2 to 3 (#902)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/automatisch/automatisch/network/alerts).
